item.title: Report X-2025020603
item.description:
Report X-2025020603

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-07
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RECEIVED A CALL FROM THE RC1 SUPERVISOR FOR A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR UNDER THE RETURN CHUTE. UPON ARRIVAL IDENTIFIES THE LEAKING HAZMAT. PLACED IT IN A SPILL TRAY. CLEANED UP SPILL AND PLACED ALL CONTAMINATED IN ANOTHER SPILL TRAY. TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL

item.title: Report X-2025020433
item.description:
Report X-2025020433

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-03
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED BY A DRIVER THAT THEY HAD A LEAKING DECLARED HAZMAT IN THEIR TRUCK. RESPONDER DONNED HIS FULL PPE AND ARRIVED ON SCENE TO FIND THE LEAKING HAZMAT ON THE FLOOR OF THE TRUCK. RESPONDER PLACED THE LEAKING HAZMAT INTO A SPILL TRAY AND CLEANED ANY SPILLAGE BEFORE PLACING THE SPILL TRAY ON HIS CART AND RETURNING TO THE PSC.
